en.body:
A simple clothing store. Developed [Gatsby](https://www.gatsbyjs.com/) [React](https://reactjs.org/) library. The design is made using the [Sass](https://sass-scss.ru/) 

The products are distributed by gender and age . There is a shopping cart and a product 

[NetlifyCMS](https://www.netlifycms.org/) is used as a content manager.
en.title: Personal blog
